mapper.insert:
insert into zh_load_feedback_log ( feedback_id, load_id, type, item_name, item_price, item_desc, feedback_time, longitude, latitude, address, speed, status, source, is_exception, is_end, end_time, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, distances )values ( #{feedbackId}, #{loadId}, #{type}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDesc},
date_format(#{feedbackTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
now(),
#{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{address}, #{speed}, #{status}, #{source},
#{isException},
'01',
#{isEnd},
'01',
date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
now(),
#{createdBy}, now(), #{updatedBy}, now(), #{isDeleted}, #{distances} )
mapper.update: update zh_load_feedback_log set feedback_id=#{feedbackId}, load_id=#{loadId}, type=#{type}, item_name=#{itemName}, item_price=#{itemPrice}, item_desc=#{itemDesc}, feedback_time=#{feedbackTime}, longitude=#{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude}, address=#{address}, speed=#{speed}, status=#{status}, source=#{source}, is_exception=#{isException}, is_end=#{isEnd}, end_time=#{endTime}, created_by=#{createdBy}, created_time=#{createdTime}, updated_by=#{updatedBy}, updated_time=now(), is_deleted=#{isDeleted}, distances=#{distances} where feedback_id=#{feedbackId}

update zh_load_feedback_log
feedback_id=#{feedbackId},
load_id=#{loadId},
type=#{type},
item_name=#{itemName},
item_price=#{itemPrice},
item_desc=#{itemDesc},
feedback_time=#{feedbackTime},
longitude=#{longitude},
latitude=#{latitude},
address=#{address},
speed=#{speed},
status=#{status},
source=#{source},
is_exception=#{isException},
is_end=#{isEnd},
end_time=#{endTime},
created_by=#{createdBy},
created_time=#{createdTime},
updated_by=#{updatedBy},
is_deleted=#{isDeleted},
distances=#{distances},
updated_time=now()
where feedback_id=#{feedbackId}
mapper.select: select feedback_id, load_id, type, item_name, item_price, item_desc, feedback_time, longitude, latitude, address, speed, status, source, is_exception, is_end, end_time, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, distances from zh_load_feedback_log where feedback_id=#{feedbackId} and is_deleted = '00'

select feedback_id, load_id, type, item_name, item_price, item_desc, feedback_time, longitude, latitude, address, speed, status, source, is_exception, is_end, end_time, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, is_deleted, distances from zh_load_feedback_log where feedback_id=#{feedbackId}
